songs.title: Such a Rush
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Such a rush to do nothing at all
Such a fuss to do nothing at all
Such a rush to do nothing at all

[Chorus 1]
Such a rush to get nowhere at all
Such a fuss to do nothing at all
Such a rush

[Chorus 2]
And it's just like you said
It's just like you said

[Chorus 1]
Such a rush to do nothing at all
Such a fuss to get nowhere at all
Such a rush, such a rush

[Chorus 2]
And it's just like you said
It's just like you said

[Verse 1]
So slow down please
Just slow down
So slow down please
Just slow down

[Chorus 3]
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush

[Verse 2]
Look at all the people
Going after money
Far too many people
Looking for their money
Everybody's out there
Trying to get money
Why can't you just tell me?
Trying to get money, rush

[Bridge]
Such a rush
We all rush
Such a rush

[Chorus 3]
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
Such a rush
